description: A striking conure that is mostly green, with a brilliant golden-orange cap on its head, orange on its cheeks, and a red and yellow belly patch. They are known for their intelligence.
temperament: Highly intelligent, playful, and affectionate. They are known for being quick learners and can be very interactive, but they also have a mischievous streak.
loudness: Loud. They have a strong, piercing call and can be quite vocal, especially when they want attention.
vocalization: Good talkers for a conure. They can develop a clear vocabulary of several words and phrases.
dietaryNeeds: A pelleted diet supplemented with plenty of fresh vegetables and some fruits. They enjoy foraging toys to keep them challenged.
healthPointers: Generally a robust and healthy bird with a lifespan of 30+ years. Ensure a varied diet to prevent nutritional deficiencies. Can be prone to feather plucking if bored.
housing: Not ideal for apartments due to their noise level. They are active birds that need a spacious cage, minimum 24"W x 24"D x 36"H.
